remarks.format: ## Remarks 使您能够执行功能，例如命中测试、 剪辑，以及擦除描边。The enables you to perform functions such as hit testing, clipping, and erasing strokes. 控件将执行的多数函数，但是如果您需要更多的控制权提供，提供更多选项。The control performs many of these functions, but if you need more control than the provides, the offers more options. 下表列出了在何处，若要了解有关管理自定义控件上的数字墨迹。The following table lists where to learn about managing digital ink on a custom control. |若要执行此操作...To do this…|请参阅这篇文章See this article| |-----------------|----------------------| |创建收集数字墨迹的控件Create a control that collects digital ink|[创建墨迹输入控件Creating an Ink Input Control](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/creating-an-ink-input-control.md)| |创建的控件，使用户能够选择墨迹Create a control that enables the user to select ink|[如何： 从自定义控件中选择墨迹How to: Select Ink from a Custom Control](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-select-ink-from-a-custom-control.md)| |创建允许用户来点擦除墨迹的控件Create a control that enables the user to point-erase ink|[如何： 清除上一个自定义控件的墨迹How to: Erase Ink on a Custom Control](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-erase-ink-on-a-custom-control.md)| ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 方法还允许派生的类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托，委托是处理派生类中的事件的首选的技术。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate, which is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在重写在派生类中，一定要调用方法的基类，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the method for the base class so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例将当前时间作为自定义属性添加到中每一条新笔画事件处理程序。The following example adds the current time as a custom property to each new stroke in the event handler. 该示例假定事件连接到在此示例中定义的事件处理程序。The example assumes that the event is connected to the event handler defined in this example. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当`applyToStylusTip`是`true`、方法影响形状的触笔提示，以及笔画的位置。When `applyToStylusTip` is `true`, the method affects the shape of the stylus tip, as well as the position of the strokes. 例如，如果旋转90 度，描边移动轴和的高度和宽度的描边起来好像已经颠倒。For example, if you rotate a 90 degrees, the strokes move around an axis and the height and width of the strokes appear to be inverted. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何在上移动所有笔画。The following example demonstrates how to move all the strokes on an . 此示例假定有调用`inkCanvas1`。This example assumes that there is an called `inkCanvas1`. [!code-csharp[StrokeCollectionMethods#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StrokeCollectionMethods/CSharp/Window2.xaml.cs#9)] [!code-vb[StrokeCollectionMethods#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StrokeCollectionMethods/VisualBasic/Window2.xaml.vb#9)]
